abstract: The European debt crisis unfolded further, with Greece adopting emergency measures for borrowers and Spain abandoning its deficit-reduction goals. Gasoline prices rose, but the Federal Reserve held to its forecast for modest economic growth. Yelp had its initial public offering.

lead_paragraph: The European debt crisis unfolded further, with Greece adopting emergency measures for borrowers and Spain abandoning its deficit-reduction goals. Gasoline prices rose, but the Federal Reserve held to its forecast for modest economic growth. Yelp had its initial public offering.

headline.main: The Week’s Business News in Pictures
